summary: With this mod you can ride new big cats (Cheetah, Lynx, Snow Lynx, Dusk Panther, Smilodon) and create armies with these creatures ... No DLC required
descriptionHtml:
With this mod you can ride new big cats (Cheetah, Lynx, Snow Lynx, Dusk Panther, Smilodon) and create armies(or hordes) with these creatures ... No DLC required

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18082601482216616015863361.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/08/26//18082601482216616015863361.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]HORDES of Felines*[/size][/b][/color] [i]with the scrolls[/i] ...


This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of Felines*(5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these 5 Felines*, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in [color=#ff8c00] Riverwood [/color]: [i] Lucan Valerius, Orgnar in the Sleeping Giant Inn[/i], Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Felines* ...

You can also find the 5 scrolls at [b][color=#00ff00]KARA[/color][/b] ([b][i][u]In the tundra near Whitherun[/u][/i][/b])


[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]ARMIES - MOUNTS - COMPANIONS[/size][/b][/color] [i]with the books[/i] ...


You can find the 16 “Spell tome XXXX" at [color=#00ff00][b]KARA[/b][/color] ([b][i][u]In the tundra near Whitherun[/u][/i][/b])

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell Tome: Dismiss Felines"


You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not



In order to find the scrolls or books at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.


*List of Felines :

1) Cheetah,

2) Small Cheetah (no scroll, no mount),

3) Lynx,

4) Snow Lynx,

5) Dusk Panther,

6) Smilodon.



[color=#ff0000][b] [size=3]Credits[/size][/b][/color]

Mihail Romanov for the Lynx, the Smilodon and the Cheetahs in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90358] Lynxes Cheetahs and Smilodon- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - megafauna) [/url], for the Dusk Panther in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90188] Daedrats and Dusk Panthers- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- azura- eso) [/url]

Flatline42 for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16296] FC Kara the Pathfinder [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”)
author: gg77
